Name: fundingInformationHelper
clcommon__Content__c:
Why do I need to enter the funding information?
By providing us with your funding account information, we can deposit the proceeds of your loan into the bank account of your choice
What do I need to open an account with Thrive Bank?
To open an account with Thrive Bank, you just need to select the type of account you wish to open, the different features of the account (such as e - statements and check images). That's it! No additional documentation or data entry.
Can I fund my loan into an account with another bank?
Sure you can. Simply click the Fund to an external bank account and provide your account information and wiring instructions.
What if I already have an account with Thrive Bank?
If you already have an account with Thrive Bank, all you have to do is indicate which account you would like to use and we will handle the rest.
